title: Pad
overview: The story of the series begins late in the evening, in July 1993, at the moment when two brothers, Ivan and Stojan, arrive at their uncle's apartment, not far from the place where a conflict with tragic consequences just happened in Podgorica.The story continues in SPUŽ pre-trial prison. In parallel, we get to know the relationship between Ivan and his father Nikola, a serious and rational man, with whom Ivan has had a complicated relationship since childhood. These two stories are complicated and expanded, illuminating on the one hand the seductive life of one of Yugoslavia's biggest acting stars, but also the dark side of the nineties, the corrupt judiciary, the prison half-world. A gallery of colorful characters that our hero meets in prison, thieves, criminals, murderers, political prisoners, the atmosphere of the nineties in which all social and moral values were questioned, the key breaks in his intimate life, his relationship with his closest relatives, family, friends, courtroom scenes, his relationship to fame and popularity.
